items.content_html: SkeletonJS is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts HTML elements into animated skeleton loaders. Itâ€™s designed to help you create visually appealing loading placeholders with minimal configuration. SkeletonJS uses CSS custom properties and a default shimmer animation to display skeleton states for your content.
items.title: deepansumor/SkeletonJS:  SkeletonJS is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts HTML elements into animated skeleton loaders. Itâ€™s designed to help you create visually appealing loading placeholders with minimal configuration. SkeletonJS uses CSS custom properties and a default shimmer animation to display skeleton states for your content.

items.content_html: A lightweight Python script that creates a structured overview of your codebase for AI context. It scans your project directory, generates a tree structure, and aggregates all text-based files into a single, well-formatted context file - perfect for providing project context to Large Language Models.
items.title: mgiesen/project2context: A lightweight Python script that creates a structured overview of your codebase for AI context. It scans your project directory, generates a tree structure, and aggregates all text-based files into a single, well-formatted context file - perfect for providing project context to Large Language Models.
